channel.title: Tweets on ggtree
channel.description: Recent content in Tweets on ggtree

item.title: Tweets
item.description: Leave me a message on Free silhouette images for phylogenetic trees found trough the ggtree vignette: https://t.co/PdDtAB0nVN — Valentina Galata (@GalataValentina) March 12, 2018 I made something with #ggtree #rstats. It's a bit fastidious to manually copy/paste code for each node, also we need more animal emojis pic.twitter.com/Zhf2Zf5GES — Jean üë®‚Äçüíª (@JeanManguy) March 6, 2018 The R-packages from Guangchuan Yu are so extremely useful - ggtree, clusterProfiler, GOSemSim, DOSE - can we please collect them and call it the Yu-niverse?
